title: How to Check Your <gradient>Instagram Unfollowers</gradient>
subtitle: Follow these 8 simple steps to securely analyze your account without sharing your password.

1.title: Open Data Export Page
1.description: Tap the button below to go directly to the platform's data export page. You may need to log in first.

2.title: Select 'Some of your information'
2.description: Don't export everything â€” we only need your followers and following list to speed this up.

3.title: Check only 'Followers and following'
3.description: Uncheck all other options like messages or media. This keeps your archive compact and optimized.

4.title: Select JSON format
4.description: This is critical: Choose JSON, not HTML format. HTML backup files will not work with our analyzer.

5.title: Choose 'All time' and tap 'Create files'
5.description: The platform will now begin processing and preparing your data export. This can take anywhere from 5 minutes to a few hours.

6.title: Wait for email notification
6.description: Keep an eye on your inbox (and spam folder!). You'll receive an email notification when your archive file is ready to download.

7.title: Download the ZIP file
7.description: Download and save the ZIP archive to your device. Once you have it, you're ready to scan and analyze it here!

8.title: Upload & Reveal Results
8.description: Head back here, drag and drop or select your ZIP file, and instantly see your unfollower report with complete analysis!

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Scan and process your Instagram data export privately in seconds.

schema.name: How to Check Who Unfollowed You on Instagram Without Login
schema.description: Step-by-step guide to scan and find Instagram unfollowers using your official data backup archive. No login required, 100% private local processing.
